info.description: Application Manager APIs to control Apache Flink jobs
info.title: Application Manager API

get.summary: Get a deployment target by name

delete.description: This operation expects the deployment to be in desired state CANCELLED

get.summary: Filter all events for a deployment or job
List all jobs. Can be filtered by DeploymentId
List all savepoints. Can be filtered by DeploymentId
Get a secret value by name
Check that the server is running
